problem_text_cn: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,∠DAB的角平分线与∠ABC的外角平分线相交于点P,且∠D+∠C=210°,则∠P=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, the angle bisector of ∠DAB and the bisector of the exterior angle ∠ABC intersect at point P, and ∠D + ∠C = N_0, then ∠P = ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:如图,∵∠D+∠C=210°,∠DAB+∠ABC+∠C+∠D=360°,∴∠DAB+∠ABC=150°．又∵∠DAB的角平分线与∠ABC的外角平分线相交于点P,∴∠PAB+∠ABP=\frac{1}{2}∠DAB+∠ABC+\frac{1}{2}(180°-∠ABC)=90°+\frac{1}{2}(∠DAB+∠ABC)=165°,∴∠P=180°-(∠PAB+∠ABP)=15°．
raw_comment: 本题考查了三角形内角和定理、多边形的内角与外角．
